0.text: Hows it goin? Im looking for a structure that my cousin said was around here.

opts.text: Where did they say it was?

desc.text: They said it was a huge maze, I wonder if there is treasure in there. They said it was mostly intact.

opts.text: Oh thats cool! Where did they say it was?
Oh really? Thats kinda interesting. I might try and find it!

2.text: I thought it was around here, but it might be a bit further in.

opts.text: Ok Ill keep an eye out!
